name: The Ritual (carrigan__, PugHugs)
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2023

Made in 48 Hours

WASD and Mouse, E to pick up and place

A game about pleasing a (tree-adjacent) god

Programming and Sounds by Carrigan Reilly

Art by Megan Stein

Additional textures from Yughues Free Concrete Materials on Unity Asset Store

[gods are the *root* of everything, we fit in the theme i swear!]
